Package com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations

Enum Summary
CellFields The fields of a Hypertable cell where HyperEntity field values can be stored.
RowLimitTypes Specifies the row limit handling types of HyperConnector search methods.
SearchParamTypes Defines the possible search parameter types for HyperConnector search methods.
SearchResultTypes Specifies the result types of HyperConnector search methods.
SerializationTypes Enum for the different serialization types that can be used with HyperConnector.
SortOrders Defines the possible sort order types of values.
TimestampAssignmentTypes Specifies how the value of the timestamp in a HyperEntity can be assigned upon insertion.
 

Annotation Types Summary
AccessGroup Specifies access groups in the Hypertable table of the HyperEntity.
CellSerializationDescriptor Defines how data must be serialized in the HyperEntity's Hypertable cell specified by columnFamily and columnQualifier.
HyperEntity Indicates that the annotated class is a HyperConnector HyperEntity.
RowKeyBasedSearchMethod Defines a row key based search method (select and/or delete).
RowKeyField Indicates that the field must be used in the row key field of the Hypertable cell(s) of the HyperEntity.
SearchMethods Defines search methods for the given HyperEntity.
Timestamp A HyperEntity may have 0 or 1 field annotated with Timestamp.
ValueField Indicates that the annotated HyperEntity field must be stored in Hypertable.
ValueList Indicates that the annotated field is a value list.
ValueMap Indicates that the annotated field is a value map.
